refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: RSA_new() allocates and initializes an RSA structure. It is equivalent to calling RSA_new_method(NULL).
RSA_free() frees the RSA structure and its components. The key is erased before the memory is returned to the system. If rsa is NULL nothing is done.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: If the allocation fails, RSA_new() returns NULL and sets an error code that can be obtained by ERR_get_error 3 . Otherwise it returns a pointer to the newly allocated structure.
